name: Help Author Larry Toller go to Africa with Afican Vision of Hope
description: The Tollers will go on their first mission trip to Africa in August 2011. Larry will be teaching at the Zambian Seminary and preaching. His wife, Kenett, will be working with widows in the Sewing ministry. His daughter, Bekah, will be working with children in Vacation Bible School. God must provide money for transportation. He may lead you to help.

name: My Story Your Story His Story
description: What will be your legacy? What is your story that will be repeated for generations yet to come? Will your story go untold because it was never written? My Story Your Story His Story is already tugging at the heartstrings of a world ready to share the wonderful adventure of a life lived with purpose and guidance from God. My Story Your Story His Story is a devotional journaling book. Unlike other devotionals and journals, the reader is encouraged to look to the past and record memories prompted by the story shared by the author. (MY STORY) It is the author’s belief that God has written amazing stories in and through our lives. These stories should be recorded for generations who follow to read and learn. (YOUR STORY) What is your story that will be repeated for generations yet to come? “Memory Journaling” reaches back to the past for future generations, leaving a lasting legacy of a life lived. God is also the Author of your life and He has given you a story to tell. (HIS STORY) larrytoller.com Memoryjournaling.com SecondWindResources.org Retail $12.95 Special Sale: $12.00 FREE Shipping!

options.name: Signed by the author. Send information for personalization to: mystory@memoryjournaling.com
